Define Documentation

#define STEP (  in,
out    ) 
 

Value:

x = x + one;                                \
    tx = data[x];                               \
    y = y + tx;                                 \
    data[x] = ty = data[y];                     \
    data[y] = tx;                               \
    tx = tx + ty;                               \
    (out) = data[tx] ^ (in);
